title: (x) 31 Studio serif face - Caxton {Chris Cousins}
content:
Easy typetopians

Does anyone recognise this font by any chance? see attach jpeg  
Cheers in advance.

Mike

author: Tonywerewolf

comments.content: It’s actually hard to have a good look at the sample without breaking one’s neck - but yes, I think it could be Caxton.
